group.label: Braintree Payments (by GENE Commerce v4.0.10)
group.comment:
Accept credit/debit cards and PayPal in your Magento store.
No setup or monthly fees and your customers never leave your store to complete the purchase.

field.label: Enable Vault CVV Re-verification
field.comment:
In order for CVV re-verification to work, you must enable CVV rules in your Braintree account. Please see the guide here on how to do so.

Please enable "CVV does not match" and "CVV is not verified" and "Issuer does not participate" only

group.comment:
Click here to login to your existing Braintree account. Or to setup a new account and accept payments on your website, click here to signup for a Braintree account.

Powered by Braintree v.zero with Hosted Fields latest technology. Hosted Fields are small, transparent iframes that replace the sensitive credit card inputs in your checkout flow - helping you meet the latest data security requirements while ensuring your customization doesn't suffer.

If you would like to add Custom Fields to your Braintree transactions, we provide an example module here that can be used to create a custom module for your store to add these fields.

Find out more.
group.label: Basic Braintree Settings

field.label: Merchant Account ID
field.comment: If you don't specify the merchant account to use to process a transaction, Braintree will process it using your default merchant account.

field.label: Skip Fraud Checks on Admin Orders
field.comment: Prevents the transaction from being sent for evaluation as part of Advanced Fraud Tools checks, on orders placed through the admin only.

field.label: Bypass Fraud Protection Threshold
field.comment: Advanced fraud protection checks will be bypassed if this threshold is met or exceeded. Leaving this field blank will disable this option.

field.label: CVV Verification
field.comment: Be sure to Enable AVS and/or CVV in Your Braintree Account in Settings/Processing Section.

field.label: Fraud Protection URL
field.comment: You will need to add this URL into your Braintree Account as Webhook Destination URL. This URL must be secure and publicly accessible.

group.label: ACH through Braintree
group.comment: ACH is currently only available in the United States and you must qualify as an eligible merchant. Please see here for more information.

group.label: Apple Pay through Braintree
group.comment:
To use Apple Pay, you will need to register your domain. Please read the following guides for information; Sandbox and Production

Additional actions may also be required. Please see here for general information about Apple Pay and here for testing information.

field.label: Enable ApplePay through Braintree
field.comment: You need to verify your domain name in your Braintree account first.

field.label: Merchant Name
field.comment: Displayed to the customer in the Apple Pay dialog.

group.label: Local Payment Methods
group.comment: All payments made with a Local Payment Method will be treated as an "Intent Sale" payment action.

field.label: Allowed Payment Methods
field.comment: Any particular payment method will only be visible to customers who's billing address is valid for that method, regardless of the method being enabled here.

field.label: Enable GooglePay through Braintree
field.comment: Consult the Braintree documentation when enabling Google Pay for production.

field.label: Merchant ID
field.comment: Your MerchantID, provided by Google.

group.label: Venmo through Braintree
group.comment: Merchants need to be approved to be able to use Venmo for payments. Please click on this link and go to the "Go Live" section to get details around approval process. You can apply for it immediately. Please note currently Venmo is available in US only.

field.label: Title
field.comment: It is recommended to set this value to "PayPal" per store views.

field.label: Enable PayPal Credit through Braintree
field.comment: PayPal Credit is currently only available in the United States and United Kingdom. PayPal Credit will be disabled if the selected value for the Merchant Country field is not US or UK. This field only available if Merchant Country is US or UK.

group.label: PayPal Credit through Braintree
group.comment: PayPal Credit is currently only available in the United States and United Kingdom, and must have been enabled on your PayPal account.

field.label: Activation Code
field.comment: This will be provided by PayPal as part of the onboarding process. Without an activation code, PayPal Credit will be disabled.

field.label: Merchant Name on the FCA Register
field.comment: It is a legal requirement in the UK to display your merchant name as on the FCA Register next to the breakdown of credit options. If this field is empty, PayPal Credit will be disabled.

field.label: Enable PayPal Pay Later through Braintree
field.comment: Display pay later messaging on your site for offers like Pay in 3, which lets customers pay with 3 interest-free monthly payments. We'll show messages on your site to promote this feature for you. You may not promote pay later offers with any other content, marketing, or materials.

field.label: Require Customer's Billing Address
field.comment: This feature needs to be enabled first for the merchant account through PayPal technical support.

field.label: Display on Shopping Cart
field.comment: Also affects mini-shopping cart.

field.label: Show Credit Button
field.comment: PayPal Credit is currently only available in the United States and United Kingdom. PayPal Credit will be disabled if the selected value for the Merchant Country field is not US or UK. This field only available if Merchant Country is US or UK.

field.label: Show Pay Later Messaging
field.comment: Displays Pay Later messaging for available offers. Restrictions apply. Click here to learn more.

field.label: Show Credit Button
field.comment: PayPal Credit is currently only available in the United States and United Kingdom. PayPal Credit will be disabled if the selected value for the Merchant Country field is not US or UK. This field only available if Merchant Country is US or UK.

field.label: Show Pay Later Messaging
field.comment: Displays Pay Later messaging for available offers. Restrictions apply. Click here to learn more.

field.label: Show Credit Button
field.comment: PayPal Credit is currently only available in the United States and United Kingdom. PayPal Credit will be disabled if the selected value for the Merchant Country field is not US or UK. This field only available if Merchant Country is US or UK.

field.label: Show Pay Later Messaging
field.comment: Displays Pay Later messaging for available offers. Restrictions apply. Click here to learn more.

group.label: Dynamic Descriptors
group.comment: Dynamic descriptors are sent on a per-transaction basis and define what will appear on your customers credit card statements for a specific purchase. The clearer the description of your product, the less likely customers will issue chargebacks due to confusion or non-recognition. Dynamic descriptors are not enabled on all accounts by default. If you receive a validation error of 92203 or if your dynamic descriptors are not displaying as expected, please contact Braintree Support.

field.label: Name
field.comment: The value in the business name field of a customer's statement. Company name/DBA section must be either 3, 7 or 12 characters and the product descriptor can be up to 18, 14, or 9 characters respectively (with an * in between for a total descriptor name of 22 characters).

field.label: Phone
field.comment: The value in the phone number field of a customer's statement. Phone must be 10-14 characters and can only contain numbers, dashes, parentheses and periods.

field.label: URL
field.comment: The value in the URL/web address field of a customer's statement. The URL must be 13 characters or shorter.
